hooks.command: file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.rs$'; then cargo check --quiet 2>&1 || (echo 'Rust syntax error detected' && exit 1); fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.command' | grep -q '^git commit'; then bash .claude/hooks/pre-commit-security.sh; fi
file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.rs$'; then cargo fmt -- "$file_path" && echo "Formatted $file_path"; fi
file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.rs$'; then cargo clippy --quiet -- -D warnings 2>&1 || (echo 'Clippy warnings found' && exit 1); fi
file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '^src/.*\.rs$'; then cargo test --quiet 2>&1 || echo 'Some tests failed'; fi
file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE 'Cargo\.(toml|lock)$'; then cargo audit --quiet || echo 'Security vulnerabilities detected'; fi
